SELECT meaning AS consumeWay, SUM(integral_sum) AS pointSum, SUM(user_num) AS userSum, SUM(integral_num) AS timeSum FROM cxb_integral c JOIN sys_integral_dict d ON c.integral_type = d. CODE AND d.type = 1
GROUP BY consumeWay

select count(1) from ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM cxb_integral c JOIN sys_integral_dict d ON c.integral_type = d.code
AND d.type = 0 GROUP BY integral_type,dt ORDER BY dt DESC ) t

select count(1) from ( SELECT count(1) FROM cxb_integral c JOIN sys_integral_dict d ON c.integral_type = d.code
AND d.type = 2 GROUP BY d.meaning,dt ) t

select count(1) from ( SELECT count(1) FROM cxb_integral c JOIN sys_integral_dict s ON c.integral_type = s.code
AND s.type = 1 GROUP BY meaning,dt )t
